name: deeply
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 extremely or strongly: I'm deeply grateful to you. He found her comments deeply irritating/offensive. We don't want to get too deeply involved with these people. After 20 years of marriage, they're still deeply in love. Synonym
profoundly
More examplesFewer examplesThe news of the accident shocked the family deeply.She sighed deeply and sat down.The radiant smile and the sparkle in her blue eyes were the clear signs of a woman still deeply in love.The instructor told us to breathe in deeply and then breathe out slowly.He was deeply wounded by her fierce criticism.

extremely or strongly: Everyone was deeply impressed by his performance.
